thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com | 10 of 141
thread.title: Christine

author: Christine
title: Christine
text: These labels are great we have them on literally everything and when our daughter developed a medical condition we needed labels to alert people we turned to Mabel's because we knew we could count on their quality. Her labels have outlasted our expectations and we still have plenty to spare. But her life depends on these and we love having the piece of mind that they are there! We also use them to label everything for our two children who hate to share but need the exact same toys. The labels stop all the arguments over who it belongs to, they can see at a glance! These labels are awesome and I would never hesitate to purchase them!
